Uses of Class
net.dv8tion.jda.core.JDABuilder

  • Packages that use JDABuilder 
    Package Description
    net.dv8tion.jda.core  

    • Uses of JDABuilder in net.dv8tion.jda.core

      Methods in net.dv8tion.jda.core that return JDABuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.addEventListener(java.lang.Object... listeners)
      Adds all provided listeners to the list of listeners that will be used to populate the JDA object.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.removeEventListener(java.lang.Object... listeners)
      Removes all provided listeners from the list of listeners.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setAudioEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables/Disables Voice functionality.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setAudioSendFactory(IAudioSendFactory factory)
      Changes the factory used to create IAudioSendSystem objects which handle the sending loop for audio packets.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setAutoReconnect(boolean autoReconnect)
      Sets whether or not JDA should try to reconnect if a connection-error is encountered.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setBulkDeleteSplittingEnabled(boolean enabled)
      If enabled, JDA will separate the bulk delete event into individual delete events, but this isn't as efficient as handling a single event would be.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setContextEnabled(boolean enable)
      Whether JDA should use a synchronized MDC context for all of its controlled threads.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setContextMap(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
      Sets the MDC mappings to use in JDA.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setCorePoolSize(int size)
      Sets the core pool size for the global JDA ScheduledExecutorService which is used in various locations throughout the JDA instance created by this builder.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setEnableShutdownHook(boolean enable)
      Enables/Disables the use of a Shutdown hook to clean up JDA.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setEventManager(IEventManager manager)
      Changes the internally used EventManager.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setGame(Game game)
      Sets the Game for our session.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setHttpClientBuilder(okhttp3.OkHttpClient.Builder builder)
      Sets the Builder that will be used by JDA's requester.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setIdle(boolean idle)
      Sets whether or not we should mark our session as afk
      This value can be changed at any time in the Presence from a JDA instance.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setMaxReconnectDelay(int maxReconnectDelay)
      Sets the maximum amount of time that JDA will back off to wait when attempting to reconnect the MainWebsocket.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setRequestTimeoutRetry(boolean retryOnTimeout)
      Whether the Requester should retry when a SocketTimeoutException occurs.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setSessionController(SessionController controller)
      Sets the SessionController for this JDABuilder instance.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setStatus(OnlineStatus status)
      Sets the OnlineStatus our connection will display.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setToken(java.lang.String token)
      Sets the token that will be used by the JDA instance to log in when buildAsync() or buildBlocking() is called.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.setWebsocketFactory(com.neovisionaries.ws.client.WebSocketFactory factory)
      Sets the WebSocketFactory that will be used by JDA's websocket client.
      JDABuilder JDABuilder.useSharding(int shardId, int shardTotal)
      This will enable sharding mode for JDA.
